Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
ClientHandler's class handles the communication between a single client and the server by making use of sockets. Serialized messages are exchanged through this class.

    Method responsible for the correct dispatch of client's messages: login and game parameters' messages are handled the Server instance, while the others are managed by ClientHandler and GameHandler's instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler(Socket socket, Server server) throws IOException
      Constructor ClientHandler creates a new ClientHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      socket - : Socket instance through which the server is connected to the client.
      server - : Server instance holding information about the clients and the server state.
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      It loops continuing to read and handle messages sent by the client: as the loop's break it closes the connection to client and eventually terminates the active match. see @Runnable
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • readMessage

      public void readMessage(Message message)
      Method responsible for the correct dispatch of client's messages: login and game parameters' messages are handled the Server instance, while the others are managed by ClientHandler and GameHandler's instances.
      Parameters:
      message - : Message instance carrying the information sent by the client.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message)
      It sends a serialized message to the client through socket.
      Parameters:
      message - : Message instance that is being sent to the client.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      It terminates the server's connection to client by removing its reference from the associations contained in the Server class. Ultimately it closes the communication's endpoint.

    • setID

      public void setID(int ID)
      Method setID sets ClientHandler's identification number.
      Parameters:
      ID - : unique number identification for the ClientHandler.

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Method getID returns ClientHandler's identification number.
      Returns:
      ID, the unique number identification for the ClientHandler.

    • setGameHandler

      public void setGameHandler(GameHandler gameHandler)
      Method setGameHandler sets ClientHandler's reference to a GameHandler instance.
      Parameters:
      gameHandler - : GameHandler instance managing the application of client's moves.

    • getGameHandler

      public GameHandler getGameHandler()
      Method getGameHandler returns ClientHandler's reference to a GameHandler instance.
      Returns:
      GameHandler instance managing the application of client's moves.

    • getCurrentClientState

      public ClientState getCurrentClientState()
      Method getCurrentClientState returns the game state in which the client is currently set to.
      Returns:
      ClientState instance identifying the client's game status.
